mapper.select: update training_user set is_del='1',update_time=now() where training_id=#{trainingId} and user_id=#{user}
select is_del from training_user where training_id=#{trainingId} and user_id=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE training_user SET is_del = 0 WHERE training_id=#{trainingId} AND user_id=#{userId}
mapper.select: select t1.user_name, t1.job_id, t1.phone, t1.email, CASE t1.gender WHEN 1 THEN '男' WHEN 2 THEN '女' ELSE '未知' END as gender, COUNT(t2.training_id) as training_count, COUNT(IF(t2.status=200, 1, NULL)) as complete_count, SUM(LEFT(t2.learn_time, LENGTH(t2.learn_time) - 1)) as total_training_time from user t1 left join training_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id and t2.is_del = 0 where t1.role = 0 and t1.is_del = 0 group by t1.user_id
